children.title: 自动滚屏
children.url: javascript:(function(window, document) { var isScrolling, scrollTimeout; var defaultScrollSpeed = 50; var scrollSpeed = 50; var adjustIncrement = 2; var jumpIncrement = 50; function start() { window.addEventListener('keydown', keyPressed); window.addEventListener('keyup', keyReleased, false); autoScroll(); } function autoScroll() { if(scrollTimeout) { clearTimeout(scrollTimeout); } window.scrollBy(0,1); scrollTimeout = setTimeout(autoScroll, scrollSpeed); isScrolling = true; } var keysPressed = []; function keyPressed(event) { keysPressed[event.keyCode] = true; console.log(keysPressed); var commandKey = (keysPressed[91] || keysPressed[93]); var leftArrow = keysPressed[37]; var rightArrow = keysPressed[39]; var upArrow = keysPressed[38]; var downArrow = keysPressed[40]; var escKey = keysPressed[27]; if (escKey) { if (isScrolling){ turnOff(); } else { autoScroll(); } } if (downArrow) { event.preventDefault(); window.scrollBy(0, jumpIncrement); autoScroll(); } if (upArrow) { event.preventDefault(); window.scrollBy(0, -jumpIncrement); autoScroll(); } if (rightArrow) { event.preventDefault(); scrollSpeed -= adjustIncrement; autoScroll(); } if (leftArrow) { event.preventDefault(); scrollSpeed += adjustIncrement; autoScroll(); } } function keyReleased(event) { delete keysPressed[event.keyCode]; } function turnOff() { clearTimeout(scrollTimeout); isScrolling = false; } start(); })(window, document);

children.title: 黑夜模式
children.url: javascript:(function(){function RGBtoHSL(RGBColor){with(Math){var R,G,B;var cMax,cMin;var sum,diff;var Rdelta,Gdelta,Bdelta;var H,L,S;R=RGBColor[0];G=RGBColor[1];B=RGBColor[2];cMax=max(max(R,G),B);cMin=min(min(R,G),B);sum=cMax+cMin;diff=cMax-cMin;L=sum/2;if(cMax==cMin){S=0;H=0;}else{if(L<=(1/2))S=diff/sum;else S=diff/(2-sum);Rdelta=R/6/diff;Gdelta=G/6/diff;Bdelta=B/6/diff;if(R==cMax)H=Gdelta-Bdelta;else if(G==cMax)H=(1/3)+Bdelta-Rdelta;else H=(2/3)+Rdelta-Gdelta;if(H<0)H+=1;if(H>1)H-=1;}return[H,S,L];}}function getRGBColor(node,prop){var rgb=getComputedStyle(node,null).getPropertyValue(prop);var r,g,b;if(/rgb\((\d+),\s(\d+),\s(\d+)\)/.exec(rgb)){r=parseInt(RegExp.$1,10);g=parseInt(RegExp.$2,10);b=parseInt(RegExp.$3,10);return[r/255,g/255,b/255];}return rgb;}function hslToCSS(hsl){return 'hsl('+Math.round(hsl[0]*360)+', '+Math.round(hsl[1]*100)+'%, '+Math.round(hsl[2]*100)+'%)';}var props=['color','background-color','border-left-color','border-right-color','border-top-color','border-bottom-color'];var props2=['color','backgroundColor','borderLeftColor','borderRightColor','borderTopColor','borderBottomColor'];if(typeof getRGBColor(document.documentElement,'background-color')=='string')document.documentElement.style.backgroundColor='white';revl(document.documentElement);function revl(n){var i,x,color,hsl;if(n.nodeType==Node.ELEMENT_NODE){for(i=0;x=n.childNodes[i];++i)revl(x);for(i=0;x=props[i];++i){color=getRGBColor(n,x);if(typeof(color)!='string'){hsl=RGBtoHSL(color);hsl[2]=1-hsl[2];n.style[props2[i]]=hslToCSS(hsl);}}}}})()

children.title: 高亮介词副词
children.url: javascript:(function(){const regex={adverbs:/(\w)(ly)(\b)/gim,verbs:/(\b)(am|are|be|been|being|go|hasn't|hasn%E2%80%99t|haven't|haven%E2%80%99t|he's|he%E2%80%99s|here's|here%E2%80%99s|i'm|i%E2%80%99m|is|it's|it%E2%80%99s|she's|she%E2%80%99s|that's|that%E2%80%99s|there's|there%E2%80%99s|they're|they%E2%80%99re|was|we're|we%E2%80%99re|were|what's|what%E2%80%99s|who's|who%E2%80%99s|you're|you%E2%80%99re)(\b)/gi};const passivator=(node)=>{if(node.hasChildNodes){let index;for(index=0;index$2$3%22;temporaryNodeValue=temporaryNodeValue.replace(regex.verbs,newString,)}if(regex.adverbs.test(temporaryNodeValue)){let newString=%22$1$2$3%22;temporaryNodeValue=temporaryNodeValue.replace(regex.adverbs,newString,)}newNode=document.createElement(%22span%22);newNode.innerHTML=temporaryNodeValue;parentNode=node.parentNode;parentNode.replaceChild(newNode,node)}};passivator(window.document.getElementsByTagName(%22body%22)[0])})();

children.title: 查看密码
GitHub 仓库大小
children.url: javascript:function bytesToSize(bytes){var sizes=['B','KB','MB','GB','TB','PB'];for(var i=0;i<sizes.length;i++){if(bytes<=1024){return bytes+' '+sizes[i]}else{bytes=parseFloat(bytes/1024).toFixed(2)}};return bytes+' PB'} function fetchRepoDetails(url,pathArray,rateLimited,withoutToken){var xmlHttp=new XMLHttpRequest();xmlHttp.onreadystatechange=function(){var resp=null;if(xmlHttp.readyState===4){if(xmlHttp.status===200)resp=JSON.parse(xmlHttp.responseText);else if(!rateLimited&&xmlHttp.status===403)return fetchRepoDetails(url,pathArray,!0,!0);if(!resp){if(xmlHttp.status===403){return alert('Rate limit happened you\'re done for the day, you\'ll '+' be able to use it normally tomorrow')} var githubPage=['pulls','issues','marketplace','explore','settings','contact','community','about','features'].indexOf(pathArray[1])>-1;if(pathArray.length>2&&!githubPage){var promptMsg='Repository not found. If you want this bookmarklet to work for '+'private or private organisation repositories click OK or press ENTER key to read the guide.';if(window.confirm(promptMsg)){window.open('https://syncwithtech.org/github-repos-size-creation-date/#privateorganizationrepositories')}}else{alert('Not%20a%20valid%20GitHub%20repository%20page')}%20return}%20var%20date=new%20Date(resp.created_at);var%20dateArr=date.toString().split('%20').splice(1,3);dateArr[1]+=',';var%20text='Created%20on:%20'+dateArr.join('%20')+'\nSize:%20'+bytesToSize(resp.size*1024);alert(text)}};xmlHttp.open('GET',url);/*%20xmlHttp.setRequestHeader('Authorization',%20'token%20abc');%20*/xmlHttp.send()}%20function%20evaluate(){if(window.location.host!=='github.com'){alert('Not%20a%20valid%20GitHub%20page.');return}%20var%20pathArray=window.location.pathname.split('/');var%20url='https://api.github.com/repos'+pathArray.slice(0,3).join('/');fetchRepoDetails(url,pathArray)}%20evaluate();

order%20=%20'none';%20%20%20%20%20%20temp.style.fontSize%20=%20'10px';%20%20%20%20%20%20temp.innerHTML%20=%20'-';%20%20%20%20%20%20temp.addEventListener('click',%20()%20=%3E%20setWpm(-10));%20%20%20%20%20%20wpmCounter%20=%20temp1.appendChild(document.createElement('div'));%20%20%20%20%20%20wpmCounter.style.fontSize%20=%20'10px';%20%20%20%20%20%20wpmCounter.style.lineHeight%20=%20'10px';%20%20%20%20%20%20wpmCounter.style.height%20=%20'10px';%20%20%20%20%20%20wpmCounter.style.margin%20=%20'10px';%20%20%20%20%20%20wpmCounter.innerHTML%20=%20wpm;%20%20%20%20%20%20temp%20=%20temp1.appendChild(document.createElement('button'));%20%20%20%20%20%20temp.style.background%20=%20'#eee';%20%20%20%20%20%20temp.style.color%20=%20'black';%20%20%20%20%20%20temp.style.border%20=%20'none';%20%20%20%20%20%20temp.style.fontSize%20=%20'10px';%20%20%20%20%20%20temp.innerHTML%20=%20'+';%20%20%20%20%20%20temp.addEventListener('click',%20()%20=%3E%20setWpm(10));%20%20%20%20%20%20inner.style.display%20=%20'inline-block';%20%20%20%20%20%20inner.style.transform%20=%20'translate(8%)';%20%20%20%20%20%20inner.innerHTML%20=%20'3';%20%20%20%20}%20%20%20%20setTimeout(()%20=%3E%20inner.innerHTML%20=%20'2',%20200);%20%20%20%20setTimeout(()%20=%3E%20inner.innerHTML%20=%20'1',%20400);%20%20%20%20gtimeout%20=%20setTimeout(()%20=%3E%20nextWord(term.split('%20').reverse()),%20600);%20%20});%20%20let%20nextWord%20=%20(words)%20=%3E%20{%20%20%20%20let%20next%20=%20words.pop();%20%20%20%20if(next.length%20%3C%203%20&&%20words.length%20&&%20words[words.length%20-%201].length%20%3C%206){%20%20%20%20%20%20next%20+=%20'%20'%20+%20words.pop();%20%20%20%20}%20%20%20%20inner.innerHTML%20=%20next;%20%20%20%20let%20duration%20=%20(1000%20/%20(wpm%20/%2060))%20*%20((next.length%20/%205%20-%201)%20*%200.5%20+%201);%20%20%20%20let%20timeout%20=%20setTimeout(()%20=%3E%20{%20%20%20%20%20%20if(words.length){%20%20%20%20%20%20%20%20if(timeout%20!==%20gtimeout){%20%20%20%20%20%20%20%20%20%20return;%20%20%20%20%20%20%20%20}%20%2 children.title: 正则高亮关键词
children.url: javascript:(function(){var count=0, text, regexp;text=prompt(%22Search regexp:%22, %22%22);if(text==null || text.length==0)return;try{regexp=new RegExp(%22(%22 + text +%22)%22, %22i%22);}catch(er){alert(%22Unable to create regular expression using text '%22+text+%22'.\n\n%22+er);return;}function searchWithinNode(node, re){var pos, skip, spannode, middlebit, endbit, middleclone;skip=0;if( node.nodeType==3 ){pos=node.data.search(re);if(pos>=0){spannode=document.createElement(%22SPAN%22);spannode.style.backgroundColor=%22yellow%22;middlebit=node.splitText(pos);endbit=middlebit.splitText(RegExp.$1.length);middleclone=middlebit.cloneNode(true);spannode.appendChild(middleclone);middlebit.parentNode.replaceChild(spannode,middlebit);++count;skip=1;}}else if( node.nodeType==1 && node.childNodes && node.tagName.toUpperCase()!=%22SCRIPT%22 && node.tagName.toUpperCase!=%22STYLE%22){for (var child=0; child < node.childNodes.length; ++child){child=child+searchWithinNode(node.childNodes[child], re);}}return skip;}window.status=%22Searching for %22+regexp+%22...%22;searchWithinNode(document.body, regexp);window.status=%22Found %22+count+%22 match%22+(count==1?%22%22:%22es%22)+%22%20for%20%22+regexp+%22.%22;})();

children.title: 加深颜色对比
children.url: javascript:(function(){function RGBtoHSL(RGBColor){with(Math){var R,G,B;var cMax,cMin;var sum,diff;var Rdelta,Gdelta,Bdelta;var H,L,S;R=RGBColor[0];G=RGBColor[1];B=RGBColor[2];cMax=max(max(R,G),B);cMin=min(min(R,G),B);sum=cMax+cMin;diff=cMax-cMin;L=sum/2;if(cMax==cMin){S=0;H=0;}else{if(L<=(1/2))S=diff/sum;else S=diff/(2-sum);Rdelta=R/6/diff;Gdelta=G/6/diff;Bdelta=B/6/diff;if(R==cMax)H=Gdelta-Bdelta;else if(G==cMax)H=(1/3)+Bdelta-Rdelta;else H=(2/3)+Rdelta-Gdelta;if(H<0)H+=1;if(H>1)H-=1;}return[H,S,L];}}function getRGBColor(node,prop){var rgb=getComputedStyle(node,null).getPropertyValue(prop);var r,g,b;if(/rgb\((\d+),\s(\d+),\s(\d+)\)/.exec(rgb)){r=parseInt(RegExp.$1,10);g=parseInt(RegExp.$2,10);b=parseInt(RegExp.$3,10);return[r/255,g/255,b/255];}return rgb;}function hslToCSS(hsl){return %22hsl(%22+Math.round(hsl[0]*360)+%22, %22+Math.round(hsl[1]*100)+%22%, %22+Math.round(hsl[2]*100)+%22%)%22;}var props=[%22color%22,%22background-color%22,%22border-left-color%22,%22border-right-color%22,%22border-top-color%22,%22border-bottom-color%22];var props2=[%22color%22,%22backgroundColor%22,%22borderLeftColor%22,%22borderRightColor%22,%22borderTopColor%22,%22borderBottomColor%22];if(typeof getRGBColor(document.documentElement,%22background-color%22)==%22string%22)document.documentElement.style.backgroundColor=%22white%22;revl(document.documentElement);function revl(n){var i,x,color,hsl;if(n.nodeType==Node.ELEMENT_NODE){for(i=0;x=n.childNodes[i];++i)revl(x);for(i=0;x=props[i];++i){color=getRGBColor(n,x);if(typeof(color)!=%22string%22){hsl=RGBtoHSL(color);hsl[2] = Math.pow(hsl[2], 6/5);n.style[props2[i]]=hslToCSS(hsl);}}}}})()

children.title: 打开选中链接
children.url: javascript:(function(){var n_to_open,dl,dll,i; function linkIsSafe(u) { if (u.substr(0,7)=='mailto:') return false; if (u.substr(0,11)=='javascript:') return false; return true; } n_to_open = 0; dl = document.links; dll = dl.length; if (window.getSelection && window.getSelection().containsNode) { /* mozilla */ for(i=0; i<dll; ++i) { if (window.getSelection().containsNode(dl[i], true) && linkIsSafe(dl[i].href)) ++n_to_open; } if (n_to_open && confirm('Open ' + n_to_open + ' selected links in new windows?%27))%20{%20for(i=0;%20i%3Cdll;%20++i)%20if%20(window.getSelection().containsNode(dl[i],%20true)%20&&%20linkIsSafe(dl[i].href))%20window.open(dl[i].href);%20}%20}%20/*%20/mozilla%20*/%20if%20(!n_to_open)%20{%20/*ie,%20or%20mozilla%20with%20no%20links%20selected:%20this%20section%20matches%20open_all_links,%20except%20for%20the%20alert%20text%20*/%20for(i%20=%200;%20i%20%3C%20dll;%20++i)%20{%20if%20(linkIsSafe(dl[i].href))%20++n_to_open;%20}%20if%20(!n_to_open)%20alert%20(%27no%20links%27);%20else%20{%20if%20(confirm(%27No%20links%20selected.%20Open%20%27%20+%20n_to_open%20+%20%27%20links%20in%20new%20windows?%27))%20for%20(i%20=%200;%20i%20%3C%20dll;%20++i)%20if%20(linkIsSafe(dl[i].href))%20window.open(dl[i].href);%20}%20}%20})();

' > *'.repeat(depth)); depth++); var gap = tri.gap.value / depth; var sag = -Math.PI * tri.sag.value / depth; tri.cssDynamic.innerHTML = ` * { transform: translateZ(${gap}px) rotateX(${sag}rad); transform-style: preserve-3d; transition: transform 1s; outline: 1px solid rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.0625); ${tri.flo.checked ?%20%27overflow:%20visible%20!important;%27%20:%20%27%27}%20}%20*:hover%20{%20transform:%20translateZ(${gap%20*%202}px)%20rotateX(${sag%20*%202}rad);%20${!tri.flo.checked%20?%20%27overflow:%20visible;%27%20:%20%27%27}%20}%20`;%20}%20},%20toggle:%20function()%20{%20if%20(tri.menu.className%20==%20%27active%27)%20{%20tri.menu.removeAttribute(%27class%27);%20}%20else%20{%20tri.menu.className%20=%20%27active%27;%20}%20},%20quit:%20function()%20{%20window.removeEventListener(%27deviceorientation%27,%20tri.gyroMove);%20window.removeEventListener(%27mousemove%27,%20tri.mouseMove);%20window.removeEventListener(%27scroll%27,%20tri.updateOrigin);%20window.addEventListener(%27resize%27,%20tri.updateOrigin);%20tri.menu.remove();%20tri.cssStatic.remove();%20tri.cssDynamic.remove();%20document.body.removeAttribute(%27style%27);%20},%20newRange:%20function(e,%20label,%20min,%20step,%20max,%20value,%20f)%20{%20tri.menu.appendChild(e);%20e.type%20=%20%27range%27;%20e.min%20=%20min;%20e.max%20=%20max;%20e.step%20=%20step;%20e.value%20=%20value;%20e.addEventListener(%27input%27,%20f);%20tri.menu.appendChild(document.createElement(%27span%27)).innerHTML%20=%20label;%20tri.menu.appendChild(document.createElement(%27br%27));%20},%20newCheckbox:%20function(e,%20label,%20f)%20{%20tri.menu.appendChild(e);%20e.type%20=%20%27checkbox%27;%20e.addEventListener(%27click%27,%20f);%20tri.menu.appendChild(document.createElement(%27span%27)).innerHTML%20=%20label;%20tri.menu.appendChild(document.createElement(%27br%27));%20},%20newButton:%20function(e,%20label,%20f)%20{%20tri.menu.appendChild(e);%20e.type%20=%20%27button%27;%20e.value%20=%20label;%20e.addEventListener(%27click%27,%20f);%20},%20init:%20function()%20{%20document.body.parentNode.appendChild(tri.menu).id%20=%20%27tri-menu%27;%20tri.newRange(tri.limit,%20%27limit%27,%200,%200.03125,%201,%200.125,%20tri.updateBody);%20tri.newRange(tri.gap,%20%27gap%20/%20distance%27,%200,%2032,%20512,%20128,%20function()%20{%20tri.updateCSS();%20tri.updateBody();%20});%20tri.newRange(tri.sag,%20%27sag%27,%20-0.25,%200.03125,%200.25,%200,%20tri.updateCSS);%20tri.newRange(tri.fov,%20%27field%20of%20view%27,%207,%201,%2013,%2010,%20tri.updateBody);%20tri.newCheckbox(tri.flo,%20%27force%20overflow%27,%20tri.updateCSS);%20tri.flo.setAttribute(%27checked%27,%20%27%27);%20tri.newCheckbox(tri.off,%20%27flatten%20layers%27,%20tri.updateCSS);%20tri.newCheckbox(tri.non,%20%27flatten%20everything%27,%20tri.updateCSS);%20tri.newButton(tri.end,%20%27Quit%27,%20tri.quit);%20tri.newButton(tri.tgl,%20%27%E2%89%A1%27,%20tri.toggle);%20tri.tgl.id%20=%20%27tri-toggle%27;%20tri.menu.appendChild(tri.cssStatic).innerHTML%20=%20`%20html,%20body%20{%20transition-property:%20none;%20height:%20100%;%20width:%20100%;%20}%20html,%20html:hover,%20#tri-menu,%20#tri-menu%20%3E%20*,%20#tri-menu%20%3E%20*:hover%20{%20transform:%20none;%20outline:%20none;%20overflow:%20auto%20!important;%20float:%20none;%20}%20#tri-menu%20{%20position:%20fixed;%20top:%200;%20left:%200;%20background:%20rgba(0,%200,%200,%200.5);%20color:%20white;%20border:%201px%20solid%20rgba(255,%20255,%20255,%200.5);;%20border-radius:%200%200%2016px%200;%20padding:%208px;%20transform:%20translate(-100%,%20-100%)%20translate(32px,%2032px);%20}%20#tri-menu.active%20{%20transform:%20none;%20}%20#tri-toggle%20{%20position:%20absolute;%20bottom:%200;%20right:%200;%20height:%2032px;%20width:%2032px;%20background:%20transparent;%20color:%20white;%20border:%20none;%20cursor:%20pointer;%20}%20#tri-menu.active%20%3E%20#tri-toggle%20{%20background:%20white;%20color:%20black;%20border-radius:%208px%200%200%200;%20}%20%60;%20tri.menu.appendChild(tri.cssDynamic);%20tri.updateCSS();%20window.addEventListener('deviceorientation',%20tri.gyroMove);%20window.addEventListener('mousemove',%20tri.mouseMove);%20window.addEventListener('scroll',%20tri.updateOrigin);%20window.addEventListener('resize',%20tri.updateOrigin);%20window.scrollBy(0,%201);%20}%20};%20tri.init();%20})();
